price: Kandi mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wawe ni We uzabakoranya (ku munsi w’ibarura). Rwose ni We Nyirubugenge buhambaye, Umumenyi uhebuje.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka huwa yaḥshuruhum innahu ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
